Title: The State of Things
Writer: Robert Kramer (screenplay), Wim Wenders (screenplay), Joshua Wallace
Actors: Isabelle Weingarten, Rebecca Pauly, Jeffrey Kime, Geoffrey Carey
Plot: On location in Portugal, a film crew runs out of film while making their own version of Roger Corman's Day the World Ended (1955). The producer is nowhere to be found and director Friedrich Munro attempts to find him in hopes of being able to finish the film.
Country: Netherlands, UK, West Germany, France, Spain, Portugal, USA
